popup_privacy_policy_description.description: In order for the extension to work and to receive cash back on your purchases, you need to confirm your agreement to the processing of your personal data.
popup_privacy_policy_description.message: In order for the extension to work and to receive cash back on your purchases, you need to confirm your agreement to the processing of your personal data.

popup_privacy_policy_sub_info.description: The Megabonus extension cannot work without information that will allow you to recognise that it is you who is using the extension. You can read more about this in the Privacy Policy.
popup_privacy_policy_sub_info.message: The Megabonus extension cannot work without information that will allow you to recognise that it is you who is using the extension. You can read more about this in the Privacy Policy.

popup_privacy_policy_decline_title.description: Unfortunately, the extension cannot work without your agreement
popup_privacy_policy_decline_title.message: Unfortunately, the extension cannot work without your agreement

popup_privacy_policy_decline_description.description:
The Megabonus extension cannot work without information that will allow you to recognise that it is you who is using the extension.
You can read more about this in the Privacy Policy.
popup_privacy_policy_decline_description.message:
The Megabonus extension cannot work without information that will allow you to recognise that it is you who is using the extension.
You can read more about this in the Privacy Policy.

popup_privacy_policy_allow.description: Allow data processing for the extension to work correctly?
popup_privacy_policy_allow.message: Allow data processing for the extension to work correctly?

popup_privacy_policy_list_item_1.description: A link to the page of the product which price change you want to track — it is necessary to inform you about the price reduction for the product you are interested in.
popup_privacy_policy_list_item_1.message: A link to the page of the product which price change you want to track — it is necessary to inform you about the price reduction for the product you are interested in.

popup_privacy_policy_list_item_2.description: The number of your AliExpress order is necessary for prompt confirmation or declination of your cash back.
popup_privacy_policy_list_item_2.message: The number of your AliExpress order is necessary for prompt confirmation or declination of your cash back.

popup_privacy_policy_list_item_3.description: Link to the page of the online store — it is necessary so that you can share it with other people and receive rewards in the future if they made a purchase in this online store.
popup_privacy_policy_list_item_3.message: Link to the page of the online store — it is necessary so that you can share it with other people and receive rewards in the future if they made a purchase in this online store.

popup_privacy_policy_list_item_4.description: The list of online store domains which is in your browser cookies — this is necessary to provide you with a list of online stores that interest you, if there is a possibility of receiving cash back for purchases in them.
popup_privacy_policy_list_item_4.message: The list of online store domains which is in your browser cookies — this is necessary to provide you with a list of online stores that interest you, if there is a possibility of receiving cash back for purchases in them.

popup_privacy_policy_list_item_5.description: The date and time of your visit to the online store — this is necessary to provide you with structured information of the online stores you visited in order of their priority for you.
popup_privacy_policy_list_item_5.message: The date and time of your visit to the online store — this is necessary to provide you with structured information of the online stores you visited in order of their priority for you.

popup_privacy_policy_list_item_6.description: Order number, order amount, order currency, order date, link to the product — this is necessary so that you do not have to remember them and then enter them yourself when filling out an application in case cash back wasn’t accrued. This data is transferred in depersonalized form to the affiliate network, which contacts the online store to make a decision on accruing cash back to you.
popup_privacy_policy_list_item_6.message: Order number, order amount, order currency, order date, link to the product — this is necessary so that you do not have to remember them and then enter them yourself when filling out an application in case cash back wasn’t accrued. This data is transferred in depersonalized form to the affiliate network, which contacts the online store to make a decision on accruing cash back to you.

popup_privacy_policy_list_item_7.description: Browser interface language — this is necessary to display the extension interface and the website in the language of your choice (adaptive localization).
popup_privacy_policy_list_item_7.message: Browser interface language — this is necessary to display the extension interface and the website in the language of your choice (adaptive localization).

popup_privacy_policy_list_item_8.description: Information about cash back activation (online store ID, User ID, date and time of activation and the name of the component with which activation was performed) — this is necessary to display cash back activation data in the interface of the Megabonus website on the «History of clicks» page. The name of the component is transmitted to analyze and identify possible problems in the operation of the cash back activation components, including the solution of problematic situations when you did not activate cash back for one reason or another.
popup_privacy_policy_list_item_8.message: Information about cash back activation (online store ID, User ID, date and time of activation and the name of the component with which activation was performed) — this is necessary to display cash back activation data in the interface of the Megabonus website on the «History of clicks», page. The name of the component is transmitted to analyze and identify possible problems in the operation of the cash back activation components, including the solution of problematic situations when you did not activate cash back for one reason or another.

popup_privacy_policy_list_item_9.description: Email address and password — this is necessary for your authorization, since the functionality of the Extension is available only to authorized users.
popup_privacy_policy_list_item_9.message: Email address and password — this is necessary for your authorization, since the functionality of the Extension is available only to authorized users.

popup_privacy_policy_list_item_10.description: A short link to a coupon (allowing, upon presenting it, to receive a discount in the partner's online store) — this is necessary, so you are able to share this coupon with other people and receive further rewards if they made a purchase in this online store.
popup_privacy_policy_list_item_10.message: A short link to a coupon (allowing, upon presenting it, to receive a discount in the partner's online store) — this is necessary, so you are able to share this coupon with other people and receive further rewards if they made a purchase in this online store.

popup_privacy_policy_list_item_11.description: Avatar, login and your name — it is necessary to display them in the corresponding elements of the Extension's interface, so that you will be aware that you are authorized as a user.
popup_privacy_policy_list_item_11.message: Avatar, login and your name — it is necessary to display them in the corresponding elements of the Extension's interface, so that you will be aware that you are authorized as a user.

popup_privacy_policy_list_item_12.description: Information about the amount of money you managed to save; information about the amount of cash back pending confirmation; information about the amount of confirmed cash back. This data is necessary to provide it to you in the relevant elements of the Extension's interface.
popup_privacy_policy_list_item_12.message: Information about the amount of money you managed to save; information about the amount of cash back pending confirmation; information about the amount of confirmed cash back. This data is necessary to provide it to you in the relevant elements of the Extension's interface.

popup_privacy_policy_list_item_13.description: Information about whether you have this browser extension installed is necessary in order to repeatedly and intrusively not offer you to install it in the future when visiting the service website (http://megabonus.com).
popup_privacy_policy_list_item_13.message: Information about whether you have this browser extension installed is necessary in order to repeatedly and intrusively not offer you to install it in the future when visiting the service website (http://megabonus.com).

promocodes_decline_message_description.message: You can always enable the promo code widget in the extension settings.

page_promocodes_no_promocodes_title.description: There are no promo codes on this site
page_promocodes_no_promocodes_title.message: There are no promo codes on this site

page_promocodes_no_promocodes_descriptio.description: You might be interested in promo codes at other shops
page_promocodes_no_promocodes_descriptio.message: You might be interested in promo codes at other shops

page_promocodes_empty_description.description: This shop has run out of active promo codes at the moment.
page_promocodes_empty_description.message: This shop has run out of active promo codes at the moment.

page_promocodes_sub_description.description: By using promo codes, you may not get cashback for your purchase.
page_promocodes_sub_description.message: By using promo codes, you may not get cashback for your purchase.

promocodes_check_text.description: We're curious, did you save money with these promo codes?
promocodes_check_text.message: We're curious, did you save money with these promo codes?

promocodes_popup_check_description.description: Did you save money with these promo codes?
promocodes_popup_check_description.message: Did you save money with these promo codes?

topline_onboarding_title.description: Are reminders getting in the way?
topline_onboarding_title.message: Are reminders getting in the way?

topline_onboarding_description.description: Disable them in one click. You can always return reminders in the settings.
topline_onboarding_description.message: Disable them in one click. You can always return reminders in the settings.

topline_disable_reminders_popup_title.description: Choose where you want to disable cashback reminders?
topline_disable_reminders_popup_title.message: Choose where you want to disable cashback reminders?

topline_disable_reminders_popup_descript.description: You can always return the cashback reminders in the extension's settings.
topline_disable_reminders_popup_descript.message: You can always return the cashback reminders in the extension's settings.

disable_reminders_popup_notification_tex.description: Cashback reminders are disabled for all shops. You can return them in the extension's settings.
disable_reminders_popup_notification_tex.message: Cashback reminders are disabled for all shops. You can return them in the extension's settings.

disable_reminders_popup_line.description: Cash back reminders at {{shopName}} are disabled.

page_wallet_description.description: Megabonus extension has recorded your purchases for which you can get cashback. Log in to Megabonus to avoid losing income.
page_wallet_description.message: Megabonus extension has recorded your purchases for which you can get cashback. Log in to Megabonus to avoid losing income.
